name: node-red-cluster
description: Complete Node-RED clustering solution with Valkey/Redis: storage, context, and leader election

scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run build:rename && npm run build:fix-imports && npm run build:copy-html
scripts.build:rename: mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/index.cjs && mv dist/cjs/index.d.ts dist/index.d.cts && mv dist/cjs/storage.js dist/storage.cjs && mv dist/cjs/context.js dist/context.cjs && mv dist/cjs/context-entry.js dist/context-entry.cjs && mv dist/cjs/types.js dist/types.cjs && mv dist/cjs/package-helper.js dist/package-helper.cjs && rm -rf dist/cjs
scripts.build:fix-imports: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['dist/index.cjs', 'dist/storage.cjs', 'dist/context.cjs', 'dist/context-entry.cjs'].forEach(file => { let content = fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8'); content = content.replace(/require\(\".\/storage\.js\"\)/g, 'require(\"./storage.cjs\")').replace(/require\(\".\/context\.js\"\)/g, 'require(\"./context.cjs\")').replace(/require\(\".\/types\.js\"\)/g, 'require(\"./types.cjs\")').replace(/require\(\".\/package-helper\.js\"\)/g, 'require(\"./package-helper.cjs\")'); fs.writeFileSync(file, content); });"
scripts.build:copy-html: mkdir -p dist/nodes && cp src/nodes/*.html dist/nodes/ && cp src/nodes/*.cjs dist/nodes/

author: Siphion
